about_the_game:
Hop quickly through deadly obstacle courses and get further than the other rabbits to win! Catchy gameplay and competitive leaderboards will have you playing just one more round. Earn trophies to rank up and face more challenging opponents! Are you skilled enough to place in the top 10 of the daily challenge? A new daily challenge level is generated daily. You'll be exercising your precision, speed, coordination, and memory. Use the arrow keys or WASD to move and hop your way to victory. Invite & follow your friends to race with them!


Includes an in-game marketplace is where you can buy and sell rabbit skins and rings! Rabbit skins are limited to only 100 of each design. With tons of rabbits and new ones being added, you're sure to find something your style. Decorate your rabbits with rings for unique spawn and death sound effects and particles. Complete quests for soft currency and encounter rare items on encounter islands.



All of your items and friends sync with King Rabbit - Puzzle!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370 2048 MB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: King Rabbit - Race

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: GeForce 210
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Race with friends through dangerous obstacle courses in this action-platformer. Hop quickly to survive obstacles, compete with friends, and win prizes. Enjoy infinite replayability, leaderboards, customizations, cross-platform support, and perfect controls.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
